actions.name: Victory Star
actions.description: Effect: The user and allies within range have +1 default ACC. When rolling to increase Luck at the end of a session, the user rolls a d10 twice and keeps the better result. If the user is an owned Pokemon, the Trainer gets an additional d6 roll for Luck instead.

actions.name: Victory Star (V)
actions.description: Effect: The user gains +2 CRIT Stages for 1 Activation.

system.description: Effect: The user and allies within range have +1 default ACC. When declaring V-Create, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to gain +2 CRIT Stages for 1 Activation. When rolling to increase Luck at the end of a session, the user (or their trainer, if owned) rolls twice and keeps the better result.
